dt: {bc}to bring (a vehicle) to a stop and keep standing at the edge of a public way
{bc}to leave temporarily on a public way or in a {a_link|parking} lot or garage
{bc}to land and leave (an aircraft) in an assigned or accessible location
{bc}to establish (something, such as a satellite) in orbit
{bc}to place, settle, or establish especially for a considerable time

dt.t: kids {wi}parked{/wi} in front of the TV

shortdef: to bring (a vehicle) to a stop and keep standing at the edge of a public way
to leave temporarily on a public way or in a parking lot or garage

dt: {bc}a coin-operated device which registers the purchase of parking time for a motor vehicle

dt: {bc}a building in which people usually pay to park their cars, trucks, etc.

dt: {bc}either one of two small lights that are on the front of a vehicle next to the headlights

dt: {bc}a place to park a car, truck, etc.

shortdef: a place to park a car, truck, etc.
